semantic_identifier: [GOLD-97]: Audit forecasting/recommendation scoring to quantify over-weighting of fit tier vs deal dynamics
title: Audit forecasting/recommendation scoring to quantify over-weighting of fit tier vs deal dynamics

sections.text: Add instrumentation and a lightweight analysis script to log score contributions for fit tier and each deal-dynamics signal (procurement stage, competition, internal alignment) in forecasting and best-next-action outputs. Produce a report over recent accounts/opportunities showing correlation to outcomes and identifying cases where high-fit still yields high scores despite negative deal dynamics. This data will define target reweighting thresholds and regression test cases for subsequent tickets.
